SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ALL_LIST.* FROM ( SELECT IMAGE_ID, IMAGE_NM, IMAGE, IMAGE_FILE, IMAGE_DC, REFLCT_YN, REG_ID, REG_DT, NTCE_BGNDE, NTCE_ENDDE, ORDTM_NTCE_YN, LINK_URL, NEW_WINDOW_YN, CASE WHEN REFLCT_YN = 'N' THEN '3' /*게시중지*/ ELSE (CASE WHEN ORDTM_NTCE_YN = 'Y' THEN '1' /*상시게시*/ ELSE (CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') < TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NTCE_BGNDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN '2' /*게시예정*/ WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NTCE_BGNDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NTCE_ENDDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN '1' /*게시중*/ ELSE '4' END) /*게시종료*/ END) END AS NTCE_STTUS, (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM EZ_CMM_CODE WHERE CODE_UPR = '28000000' AND CODE = SUBSTR( mi.TYPE, 2, INSTR(mi.TYPE, ',',2)-2) ) TYPE, SORT FROM EZ_MAIN_IMAGE mi WHERE 1=1
AND IMAGE_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
and TYPE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeywordTo}||'%'
ORDER BY NTCE_STTUS ASC, SORT, IMAGE_ID DESC ) ALL_LIST ) WHERE RNUM > #{firstIndex} AND RNUM <= #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ALL_LIST.* FROM ( SELECT IMAGE_ID, IMAGE_NM, IMAGE, IMAGE_FILE, IMAGE_DC, REFLCT_YN, REG_ID, REG_DT, NTCE_BGNDE, NTCE_ENDDE, ORDTM_NTCE_YN, LINK_URL, NEW_WINDOW_YN, CASE WHEN REFLCT_YN = 'N' THEN '3' /*게시중지*/ ELSE (CASE WHEN ORDTM_NTCE_YN = 'Y' THEN '1' /*상시게시*/ ELSE (CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') < TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NTCE_BGNDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN '2' /*게시예정*/ WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NTCE_BGNDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NTCE_ENDDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN '1' /*게시중*/ ELSE '4' END) /*게시종료*/ END) END AS NTCE_STTUS, TYPE, SORT FROM EZ_MAIN_IMAGE WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY NTCE_STTUS ASC, SORT, IMAGE_ID DESC ) ALL_LIST ) WHERE NTCE_STTUS = '1' AND RNUM > #{firstIndex} AND RNUM <= #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM EZ_MAIN_IMAGE WHERE 1=1
AND IMAGE_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
and TYPE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeywordTo}||'%'

SELECT IMAGE_ID, IMAGE_NM, IMAGE, IMAGE_FILE, IMAGE_DC, REFLCT_YN, REG_ID, REG_DT, NTCE_BGNDE, NTCE_ENDDE, ORDTM_NTCE_YN, LINK_URL, NEW_WINDOW_YN, CASE WHEN REFLCT_YN = 'N' THEN '3' /*게시중지*/ ELSE (CASE WHEN ORDTM_NTCE_YN = 'Y' THEN '1' /*상시게시*/ ELSE (CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') < TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NTCE_BGNDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN '2' /*게시예정*/ WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NTCE_BGNDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NTCE_ENDDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN '1' /*게시중*/ ELSE '4' END) /*게시종료*/ END) END AS NTCE_STTUS, TYPE, SORT FROM EZ_MAIN_IMAGE WHERE IMAGE_ID = #{imageId}

SELECT IMAGE_ID, IMAGE_NM, IMAGE, IMAGE_FILE, IMAGE_DC, REFLCT_YN, REG_ID, REG_DT, NTCE_BGNDE, NTCE_ENDDE, ORDTM_NTCE_YN, LINK_URL, NEW_WINDOW_YN, 'NONE' AS NTCE_STTUS, TYPE, SORT FROM EZ_MAIN_IMAGE WHERE REFLCT_YN = 'Y' AND (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NTCE_BGNDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NTCE_ENDDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') OR ORDTM_NTCE_YN = 'Y') ORDER BY SORT ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EZ_MAIN_IMAGE (IMAGE_ID, IMAGE_NM, IMAGE, IMAGE_FILE, IMAGE_DC, REFLCT_YN, REG_ID, REG_DT, NTCE_BGNDE, NTCE_ENDDE, ORDTM_NTCE_YN, LINK_URL, NEW_WINDOW_YN, TYPE) VALUES (#{imageId}, #{imageNm}, #{image}, #{imageFile}, #{imageDc}, #{reflctYn}, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{ntceBgnde}, #{ntceEndde}, #{ordtmNtceYn}, #{linkUrl}, #{newWindowYn}, #{type})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT IMAGE_ID, IMAGE_NM, IMAGE, IMAGE_FILE, IMAGE_DC, REFLCT_YN, REG_ID, REG_DT, NTCE_BGNDE, NTCE_ENDDE, ORDTM_NTCE_YN, LINK_URL, NEW_WINDOW_YN, CASE WHEN REFLCT_YN = 'N' THEN '3' /*게시중지*/ ELSE (CASE WHEN ORDTM_NTCE_YN = 'Y' THEN '1' /*상시게시*/ ELSE (CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') < TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NTCE_BGNDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN '2' /*게시예정*/ WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NTCE_BGNDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NTCE_ENDDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN '1' /*게시중*/ ELSE '4' END) /*게시종료*/ END) END AS NTCE_STTUS, TYPE, SORT FROM EZ_MAIN_IMAGE ) TBL WHERE REFLCT_YN = 'Y' AND NTCE_STTUS = '1' ORDER BY NTCE_STTUS ASC, SORT, IMAGE_ID DESC
SELECT B.FILE_STRE_COURS AS FILE_STRE_COURS, B.STRE_FILE_NM AS STRE_FILE_NM FROM EZ_MAIN_IMAGE A, COMTNFILEDETAIL B WHERE 1 = 1 AND IMAGE_ID = #{imageId} AND A.IMAGE_FILE = B.ATCH_FILE_ID

SELECT IMAGE_ID, SORT FROM EZ_MAIN_IMAGE WHERE SORT =( SELECT MAX(SORT) FROM EZ_MAIN_IMAGE WHERE SORT < #{sort} AND ( (ORDTM_NTCE_YN = 'Y') OR (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') < TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NTCE_BGNDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) OR (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NTCE_BGNDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NTCE_ENDDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) ) )

SELECT IMAGE_ID, SORT FROM EZ_MAIN_IMAGE WHERE SORT =( SELECT MIN(SORT) FROM EZ_MAIN_IMAGE WHERE SORT > #{sort} AND ( (ORDTM_NTCE_YN = 'Y') OR (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') < TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NTCE_BGNDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) OR (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NTCE_BGNDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NTCE_ENDDE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) ) )

SELECT IMAGE_ID, IMAGE_NM, IMAGE, IMAGE_FILE, IMAGE_DC, REFLCT_YN, REG_ID, REG_DT, NTCE_BGNDE, NTCE_ENDDE, ORDTM_NTCE_YN, LINK_URL, NEW_WINDOW_YN, TYPE, SORT FROM EZ_MAIN_IMAGE WHERE REFLCT_YN = 'Y' AND NTCE_BGNDE <= TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyymmddhh24mi') AND NTCE_ENDDE >= TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyymmddhh24mi') ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
